author: Mario Jorell Haigler

text: 'Good ramen'

text: 'The other items I ordered were good but the Okonomiyaki I ordered was completely raw in the center. After eating a couple bites and noticing it was off my stomach hurt.'

author: Diana Nunes
text: 'Great tasting food with a great vibe. Has outdoor and indoor seating. Establishment was clean and service was courteous and timely. I will definitely be coming back.'

author: Em Cat

author: Leti
text: "Service was good

author: Kesavanand M
text: 'Soup broths are great here. Wish they had more rice and shrimp options.'

text: 'I thoroughly enjoy their spicy pork bowl. I would enjoy the buns more if there was some acid to cut all the sweetness

author: Jill Stapleton
text: 'So good! It is a smallish location

author: Marcus Jimenez
text: 'The spicy miso broth and pork buns were pretty good but the Chashu in the ramen tasted and smelled expired. Ive accidentally consumed expired pork before and it had the same smell and taste to it so I just ended up trashing it.'

author: Michaela C. Dudley
text: 'The ramen here is good but pretty overpriced. Unfortunately the customer service is terrible. I order from here a couple times a month because I live down the block. I ordered the vegetable ramen today for delivery through UberEats (because ‚Ä¶'

text: 'Nice ramen place in Hoboken. They have nice open vibe and have indoor and outdoor seating. We were greeted by a nice lady and got a table instantly. It was surprisingly crowded given we went on a Monday eve. They have 1 vegetarian ramen and ‚Ä¶'

text: 'Really enjoyed'

text: "Ordered through DoorDash and missing items. Claimed the driver ate my food and wouldn't do anything about it. I guess it is possible the driver ate my food but highly unlikely. Food is ok at best. They give a few drops of sauce in a cup to ‚Ä¶"

text: 'Everything we tried was delicious'

text: "This was not the best ramen I've ever had. Noodles tasted like they came out of a $0.29 bag. Broths were decent

Vivi‚Äôs is way better with the ramen. But this place does have yummy sides and rice bowls. I just wouldn‚Äôt recommend the ramen. Very sweet workers and service'
